AdditionalNotes.value: Titrate dose according to blood pressure.
Children aged 1 to 17 years of age. Titrate dose according to blood pressue, rate of infusion may be increased every 15 to 30 minutes. Maximum dose recommended: 4 to 5 mcg/kg/minute.

Initial dose of 5 mg/hour increased by 2.5 mg/hour every 5 minutes (for rapid titration) to every 15 minutes (for gradual titration) up to a maximum dose of 15 mg/hour. For rapidly titrated patients, consider reducing to 3 mg/hour after response is achieved. Initial goal of therapy is to reduce mean arterial BP by no more than 25% within the first hour and then to 160/100-110 mmHg within the next 2 to 6 hours if stable. Titrate dose slowly in patients with renal and liver impairment.
